title: Two Tiles, 16th–17th century
creditline: Gift of A. Algara R. de Terreros
description: Moulded in low relief, with white, blue, green and light brown glazes. Interlacing bands forming tangent circles, large and small, enclosing green and blue foliage forms.

tombstone.epitaph:
Two Tiles, 16th–17th century.
16th–17th century. Glazed moulded earthenware. Gift of A. Algara R. de Terreros. 1935-16-7-a.
